LL power(LL b,LL e)
{
	if(b==0 && e==0) return 1;
	if(b==0 && e>1)  return 0;	
	if(b>0 && e==0) return 1;
	LL r=1;
	while(e)
	{
		if(e&1) { r = r*b;  }
		e >>= 1; b = b*b;
		
	}
return r;
}

LL gcd(LL a, LL b) {  if(b==0) return a;  else return gcd(b,a%b);  }

LL arr[100001];
int pos;


int main() {

int test; INT(test);

	while(test--) {
		
		LL n;
		int k;

		LLD(n);
		INT(k);

		if(k==1) {
			
			PLLD(n);
			continue;
		}

		double lgn = log(n);
		double lgk = log(k);
		double lgnk = lgn/lgk;
		//cout<<" lgn = "<<lgn<<" lgk = "<<lgk<<" lgnk = "<<lgnk<<endl;
		

		int x = 0;
		pos=0;
		int limit = (int)lgnk + 1;
		while(x<=limit) {
			
			LL t = power(k,x);

			if(t==n) {

				arr[pos++]  = t;
				break;
			}

			if(t>n) 
				break;

			if(t<n) {

				arr[pos++] = t;
				++x;
			}

		}


		//FOR(i,0,pos)
		//	cout<<" arr[i] = "<<arr[i]<<endl;

		int coins=0;

		LL sum=0;
		
		int used=0;
		--pos;
		LL n1 = n;
		while(sum<n1 && pos>=0) {

			if(arr[pos]<=n) {
				
				int k1 = n/arr[pos];
				LL s1 = min(k1,k)*arr[pos];
				sum += s1;	

				n -= s1; 

				coins += min(k1,k);
						
			}

			pos--;	
		}


		//cout<<" coins  = "<<coins<<endl;		
			

		PINT(coins);

	}



return 0;
}
